Into the Arctic | Innovative Travel | World Travellers - World Travellers Find your nearest store Destinations Our Deals About Blogs Contact Us SIGN UP Into the Arctic 11 days | Saariselka to Rovaniemi Embark on an unforgettable 11-day Arctic Odyssey, traversing the breathtaking landscapes of Finland, Sweden, and Norway. This immersive journey offers a captivating exploration of the Arctic Circle's wonders, from the snow-laden Lapland of Finland to the ice-carved marvels of Sweden, culminating in the mesmerizing spectacle of the Northern Lights. Prepare to be enchanted as you witness nature's grandeur unfold before your eyes, leaving you with indelible memories of the world's northernmost wonders. Begin your adventure in Finland's Lapland, where pristine snowscapes and traditional Sami culture await. Experience the thrill of husky sledding and reindeer safaris against the backdrop of snow-covered forests. Then, journey into Sweden, where ice-carved wonders such as the ICEHOTEL and the stunning landscapes of Abisko National Park beckon. Finally, in Norway, chase the elusive Northern Lights as they dance across the Arctic sky, casting an ethereal glow over the snowy terrain. This Arctic Odyssey promises an unforgettable blend of adventure, natural beauty, and cultural immersion, leaving you spellbound by the magic of the far north.
